item.title: 宁德时代、中镍、老挝黄金将入选香港股票基准指数
item.description: 恒生指数有限公司在季度检讨后宣布，将电动汽车电池制造商宁德时代新能源科技股份有限公司、矿业公司中矿国际集团有限公司及珠宝商老浦黄金有限公司纳入香港股市基准指数。【原文：Hang Seng Indexes Co. is adding electric-vehicle battery-maker Contemporary Amperex Technology Co., miner CMOC Group Ltd. and jeweler Laopu Gold Co. to Hong Kong’s equity benchmark gauge, the index compiler said following its quarterly review.】

item.title: 英国禁止巴勒斯坦行动组织属违法行为，法官裁定
item.description: 伦敦法官裁定，英国政府依据反恐法律对巴勒斯坦行动组织实施的禁令违法，此举使针对该组织数百名支持者的起诉陷入存疑状态。【原文：A British government ban on Palestine Action under anti-terror laws was unlawful, London judges ruled, throwing hundreds of prosecutions against supporters of the group into doubt.】

item.title: 俄罗斯将基准利率降至15.5%，尽管通胀率有所回升
item.description: 俄罗斯央行连续第六次下调借贷成本，为在高利率下苦苦挣扎的企业带来些许缓解，尽管通胀正在加速。【原文：Russia’s central bank lowered borrowing costs for the sixth straight time, delivering modest relief to businesses struggling under high interest rates even as inflation quickened.】

item.title: 石油股暴涨21%令分析师对2026年持乐观态度
item.description: 自年初以来，石油公司股价已大幅飙升——分析师认为这是今年剩余时间股市看涨的信号。【原文：Oil-company stocks have surged sharply since the start of the year — and analysts see that as a bullish sign for the rest of it.】

item.title: 穆巴达拉资本收购清晰频道后，正寻求"复杂性"投资
item.description: 穆巴达拉资本正采取更积极的交易策略，涉足私募股权巨头避之不及的复杂交易，并参与其他主权投资者通常回避的数十亿美元收购案。【原文：Mubadala Capital is embracing a more aggressive stance on dealmaking, wading into complicated transactions shunned by the titans of private equity and participating in multibillion-dollar buyouts that many other sovereign investors typically avoid.】

item.title: 爱泼斯坦曾付费委托声誉管理公司压制其儿童性犯罪的网络信息
item.description: 杰弗里·爱泼斯坦曾雇佣网络声誉管理公司，试图掩盖其2008年性犯罪定罪的负面报道，并通过持续多年的努力在互联网上大量发布正面内容，以重塑其公众形象。【原文：Jeffrey Epstein tapped online reputation management firms to bury negative coverage of his 2008 sex offense conviction and flood the internet with favorable content in a years-long effort to rehabilitate his public image.】

item.title: 汉莎航空时隔六年有望重返DAX指数
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司即将重返德国顶级股票基准指数，距其因新冠疫情爆发引发股价暴跌而失去该席位已近六年。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG is on the cusp of returning to Germany’s top stock benchmark, almost six years on from losing its spot due to a stock plunge spurred by the outbreak of Covid-19.】

item.title: 奥地利将放宽部分国防产品出口限制以赶上军费开支浪潮
item.description: 奥地利政府正寻求放宽对武器和两用物品出口实施数十年的限制，以帮助制造商从欧洲国防产业的繁荣中获利。【原文：Austria’s government is looking to loosen decades-old limits on the export of weapons and dual-use goods to help manufacturers profit from a European defense boom.】

item.title: 人民币升值放缓，中国外汇兑换量自历史高位回落
item.description: 1月份，中国银行客户将外币兑换为人民币的规模有所缩减，这与该国严格管控的货币升值步伐放缓相吻合。【原文：Chinese banks’ clients made less foreign-exchange conversion into the yuan in January, coinciding with a slower pace of appreciation for the country’s tightly managed currency.】

item.title: 中国信贷增速因季节性因素及政府刺激措施而回升
item.description: 中国1月份信贷扩张力度较去年同期显著增强，这主要得益于强劲的政府债券销售以及推动融资活动的季节性因素。【原文：China’s credit expansion picked up more than expected from a year ago in January, boosted by strong government bond sales as well as seasonal factors driving financing activities.】

item.title: 阿瑞斯牵头为EG提供14亿欧元私募信贷贷款组合
item.description: 知情人士透露，Ares Management Corp.正牵头为斯堪的纳维亚软件企业EG A/S提供约14亿欧元（17亿美元）的私募信贷融资。【原文：Ares Management Corp. is leading a private credit financing of about €1.4 billion ($1.7 billion) for Scandinavian software business EG A/S, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美银称避险美元交易将推升国际资产
item.description: 美国银行的迈克尔·哈特内特指出，随着投资者抛售美元和美国股票转而配置国际资产，美国贸易政策正在塑造一个"新世界秩序"。【原文：US trade policies are creating a “new world order” as investors swap the dollar and American equities for international assets, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 波兰通胀率超预期上升，降息前景存疑
item.description: 波兰1月份通胀放缓幅度低于预期，令市场对下月降息的预期遭受打击。【原文：Poland’s inflation slowed less than forecast in January in a blow to market expectations for an interest cut next month.】

item.title: 信实集团获美国通用许可证 可直接购买委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度私营炼油商信实工业有限公司已获得美国颁发的通用许可证，这将允许该公司直接购买委内瑞拉石油。【原文：Indian private refiner Reliance Industries Ltd. has received a general license from the United States that will allow it to purchase Venezuelan oil directly, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 零散股：亚当·波森为何认为通胀将达4%（播客）
item.description: 未来总是难以预测，但关于通胀的讨论，通常聚焦于美联储需要多长时间才能将通胀率拉回2%的目标区间。换言之，人们普遍认同通胀方向，却对速度存在分歧。 但本期嘉宾却与主流观点激烈相左。彼得森国际经济研究所所长亚当·波森认为，通胀率将在年底回升至4%。他首次在与他人合著的文章中提出这一论点——【原文：The future is always tough to predict, but generally when it comes to inflation, a lot of the debate is about how long it will take the Federal Reserve to get back to its 2% target. In other words, people generally agree on the direction, but disagree on the speed. But our guest on this episode violently disagrees with the consensus direction. Peterson Institute President Adam Posen thinks inflation will be back at 4% by the end of the year. He first unveiled his thesis in a piece co-written wit】

item.title: 经济学家预测南非将再降息三次，对降息时机存在分歧
item.description: 一项调查显示，南非储备银行在结束当前宽松周期前，可能还将再降息三次。【原文：The South African Reserve Bank will likely cut interest rates three more times before ending its current easing cycle, according to a survey.】

item.title: 芬兰养老基金调整持仓押注股市领涨行情
item.description: 芬兰养老基金正着手抛售低收益资产类别，以应对即将实施的改革——该改革将允许其增加股票持仓。随着该国退休人口持续增长，且公共财政亟需资金注入，此举押注于股票投资将带来高于房地产和基础设施的回报。【原文：Finnish pension funds are starting to sell lower-yielding assets classes in anticipation of a reform that will enable them to increase their stock holdings. With the country’s ranks of pensioners steadily rising — and the country’s public coffers in need of a cash infusion — it’s a bet on equity delivering higher returns than real estate and infrastructure.】

item.title: 中国AI应用智普计划在上海上市，此前在香港股价飙升320%
item.description: 中国人工智能模型开发商智普科技计划在上海进行二次上市，此前该公司刚在香港完成5.58亿美元的首次公开募股。此举表明市场对国内生成式人工智能热潮仍具发展潜力的信心。【原文：Chinese artificial-intelligence model developer Zhipu is planning a second listing in Shanghai following its recent $558 million initial public offering in Hong Kong, a sign of confidence that the country’s generative-AI rally still has legs.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦债券吸引19个月来最大规模外资流入
item.description: 巴基斯坦主权债券吸引到2024年6月以来最大的月度净外资流入，随着本国货币走强，这表明投资者对该市场的信心正在增强。【原文：Pakistan drew the biggest monthly net foreign inflows into its sovereign bonds since June 2024, signaling improving investor sentiment for the market as its currency strengthens.】

item.title: 印度石油部长普里因爱泼斯坦邮件事件面临辞职呼声
item.description: 印度主要反对党国民大会党要求该国石油部长辞职，因其被指与已定罪的性犯罪者杰弗里·爱泼斯坦存在关联。【原文：The Indian National Congress, the country’s main opposition group, called for the resignation of the country’s oil minister because of his alleged links to convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.】

item.title: 印尼因涉嫌非法进口查封蒂芙尼门店
item.description: 印度尼西亚因涉嫌违反进口规定，已封锁雅加达的三家蒂芙尼专卖店。此举是总统普拉博沃·苏比安托政府下，针对未申报高价值商品展开的更大规模打击行动的一部分。【原文：Indonesia has sealed three Tiffany & Co. stores in Jakarta on suspicion of import violations, part of a broader crackdown on undeclared high-value goods under the administration of President Prabowo Subianto.】

item.title: 印度官员称，该国修订后的数据解决了国际货币基金组织的担忧
item.description: 印度一位高级官员周五表示，该国基于新系列数据编制的消费者通胀指数，已消除了国际货币基金组织对印度数据完整性的担忧。【原文：India’s consumer inflation index based on the new series addresses the International Monetary Fund’s concerns about the country’s data integrity, a top official said Friday.】

item.title: 据称与特朗普商业伙伴有关联的印尼媒体公司正考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印尼跨国集团MNC旗下的媒体娱乐子公司PT MNC Digital Entertainment正考虑在香港进行二次上市。这将是亚洲金融中心罕见地迎来非中国企业寻求上市的案例。【原文：PT MNC Digital Entertainment, the media and entertainment unit of Indonesian conglomerate MNC Group is considering a second listing in Hong Kong, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be a rare deal for a non-Chinese company seeking to float shares in the Asian financial hub.】

item.title: 希思罗机场首席执行官仍对第三跑道项目持怀疑态度
item.description: 伦敦希思罗机场负责人对耗资十亿美元的第三跑道建设项目能否推进表示怀疑，称今年规划工作的复杂性可能阻碍项目进展。【原文：The head of London Heathrow Airport expressed doubt about whether a billion-dollar project to build a third runway will go ahead, saying planning complexities this year could hinder progress.】

item.title: 英格兰银行考虑聘请外部机构协助收集私人市场压力数据
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募市场中的一些主要参与者正与英国央行进行磋商，拟委托第三方机构为其开创性的行业压力测试收集数据，以确保该项目能按严格的时间表推进。【原文：Some of the biggest players in private markets are in talks with the Bank of England about using a third party firm to gather data for its ground-breaking industry stress test so that the project can meet demanding timetables, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英格兰银行正考虑借助外部力量获取私人市场压力数据
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募市场中的一些主要参与者正与英国央行进行磋商，拟委托第三方机构为其开创性的行业压力测试收集数据，以确保该项目能按严格的时间表推进。【原文：Some of the biggest players in private markets are in talks with the Bank of England about using a third party firm to gather data for its ground-breaking industry stress test so that the project can meet demanding timetables, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着贸易规模扩大，更多暗色油轮抵达印度拆船厂
item.description: 不到一个月内，三艘遭美国制裁的油轮已抵达印度西海岸等待拆解。对于正努力接纳更多问题船舶以应对行业低迷的拆船业而言，今年开局异常强劲。【原文：Three US-sanctioned tankers have arrived for demolition on India’s west coast in under a month, an unusually strong start to the year for a ship-breaking trade that is increasing its acceptance of dark vessels in order to counter a painful downturn.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦铁路运营商考虑最早于五月进行10亿美元IPO
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中亚国家哈萨克斯坦唯一的铁路运营商——哈萨克斯坦铁路公司正考虑最早于5月进行首次公开募股，筹集约10亿美元资金，作为其大规模扩张计划的一部分。【原文：Kazakhstan Temir Zholy, the Central Asian country’s sole railway operator, is considering an initial public offering as soon as May to raise about $1 billion as part of its broad expansion drive, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 瑞士通胀率保持正增长，瑞士央行获得有限缓解
item.description: 1月份瑞士通胀率维持在零上方，这使瑞士国家银行暂时得以喘息，暂时缓解了重启负利率政策的压力。【原文：Swiss inflation stayed just above zero in January, offering limited respite to the Swiss National Bank from pressure to reintroduce negative interest rates.】
